title: A Spirited Seduction
description: Only the ghost of the renowned madam Nell deNuit can teach Sabrina Simmons the art of seduction. And helping Sabrina is Nell's only chance to get to heaven. They have less than a month to tempt the Viscount Colbridge into Sabrina's armsâ€”and keep him from buying her house. But will the notorious rake see right through their clever charade?
author: Casey Claybourne
